title: Emma Watson PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Actress shares a passionate kiss with handsome mystery man
text:
Advertisement

Emma Watson shared a passionate kiss with a mystery man as she stepped out for lunch in London on Thursday.

The Harry Potter actress, 29, couldn't contain her passion for her handsome companion as she leaned in for a sweet kiss with him while taking a phone call.

The smitten star then stared into her new man's eyes as the apparent new couple smiled at one another in the street before making their way to a waiting car.

Who's that? Emma Watson shared a passionate kiss with a mystery man as she stepped out for lunch in London on Thursday

The mystery hunk looked delighted to be in the star's company as he locked lips with her as they left Gail's Bakery.

Emma looked stylish and low-key in a white, pastel pink and terracotta sweater, paired with black joggers as she enjoyed a break from her hectic schedule.

The beauty wore her locks in loose waves with a grey woolen hat protecting her from the autumn chill.

Her handsome companion looked sharp in a navy padded jacket, striped scarf and jeans.

PDA fest: The smitten star then stared into her new man's eyes as the apparent new couple smiled at one another in the street before making their way to a waiting car

Look of love: Emma couldn't tear her eyes away from the handsome mystery man as they chatted in the street

Smile: The pair couldn't keep their hands off one another as they hugged outside a cafe

Kiss: The Little Women star only had eyes for her hunky new man as they cuddled and kissed in the street

His locks were pulled back into a ponytail with the man completing his look with trendy shades.

Emma was last romantically linked to Dominic Piazza, with the pair spotted on several outings in August.

She also had a brief fling with former Oculus CEO Brendan Iribe, 40.

Cute couple: The pair looked relaxed and happy as they chatted in the street after grabbing lunch

Smile: Emma's companion looked pretty pleased with himself as he smiled while chatting with the star

Sweet: Emma and her new man shared several kisses outside the shop before leaving the cafe

Emma first sparked romance rumours with game programmer Brendan when they were seen at a dinner date in Los Angeles earlier this summer.

She was seen trying to make a low-key departure from Santa Monica's Via Veneto Restaurant as she was pictured heading into a black taxi, while the entrepreneur followed her into the vehicle shortly after.

On their alleged romance, a source told MailOnline: 'They have been dating for some time. Hilariously her last boyfriend before him was also a tech CEO called Brendan.'

University of Maryland alum Brendan co-founded Facebook-owned virtual reality company Oculus back in 2012, before leaving the company late last year.

Chic: Emma looked stylish and low-key in a white, pastel pink and terracotta sweater, paired with black joggers as she enjoyed a break from her hectic schedule

Dapper: Her handsome companion looked sharp in a navy padded jacket, striped scarf and jeans

Smile: Emma looked giddy as she was escorted to her car with her companion following close behind

Off we go: Emma looked like she was having a great time as she hurried to the car after her romantic lunch

On his exit, Brendan said: 'After six incredible years, I am moving on. Working alongside so many talented people at Oculus and Facebook has been the most transformative experience of my career.

'This will be the first real break I’ve taken in over 20 years. It’s time to recharge, reflect and be creative. I’m excited for the next chapter.'

He served as CEO of the company until 2016, when he was replaced by Facebook VP of VR Hugo Barra.

Earlier this year there was speculation that Emma was romancing her Harry Potter co-star Tom Felton after they posted a snap of themselves hanging out together.

The actress and her one-time crush, 31 - who portrayed Hermione Granger and villain Draco Malfoy respectively in the wizard franchise - posted a snap to Instagram having an intimate guitar lesson.

The pair's followers took to social media in droves, claiming they could be dating and devising couple names such as 'Dramione' and 'Feltson' for the former child stars.

Laugh out loud: Emma appeared to be cracking up with laughter as she hurried to the car with the mystery man

The Circle star Emma previously dated Glee's Chord Overstreet last year, before they called it quits after a six-month relationship.

A source told The Sun at the time: 'Emma and Chord kept quiet about their relationship at first but they really hit it off. They spent a lot of time together in Los Angeles and were photographed quite a bit just a couple of months ago.

'But things just haven't worked out between them and they are both now single again.'

The Beauty and The Beast actress is said to have previously struck up a romance with producer Roberto Aguire in 2015, after meeting on the set of Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.

Emma was previously in a long-term relationship with fellow Oxford University alum Will Adamowicz, who she first started dating in 2011.

Emma has been busy with work recently and will next appear on screen in the latest adaptation of Little Women.

The actress replaced Emma Stone in the role of Meg March in Greta Gerwig's big-screen take on the Louisa May Alcott's 1868 novel.

Meryl Streep, Laura Dern, Saoirse Ronan, Florence Pugh, and Timothée Chalamet also star in the drama - which hits US theaters December 25 and UK theaters December 26.

And on August 4, the UN Goodwill Ambassador helped launch a free legal advice line (020 7490 0152) for those in England and Wales suffering from sexual harassment at work.

'It finally feels like people are realising the scale of the problem, and I'm certainly hopeful that with global standards such as the recent International Labour Organisation treaty on harassment at work, we'll start to see a new climate of prevention and accountability on this issue domestically,' the Time's Up activist told The Telegraph.
description: Emma Watson shared a passionate kiss with a mystery man as she stepped out for lunch in London on Thursday.
